    • Method Detail

      • compile

        public abstract java.lang.String compile(java.lang.String fileName,
                       java.lang.Boolean error)
        Compiles the given code, and if there was not any error, creates a compiled (byte) file.
        Parameters:
        fileName - path of the file containing the programming code
        error - reference to a boolean, it is set inside the method, if there was any errors during compilation
        Returns:
        the path of the file created

      • run

        public abstract double run(java.lang.String fileName,
         java.lang.String[] inputs,
         java.lang.String output,
         java.lang.Boolean error)
        Run the given compiled (byte) file and provide the given inputs.
        Parameters:
        fileName - path of the file containing the (byte) runnable code
        inputs - the desired inputs in order, to provide during running
        output - reference to a String, it is set inside the method; the output of the program
        error - reference to a boolean, it is set inside the method, if there was any errors during running
        Returns:
        double: runtime, if error occurs, 0.0
